channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiManager , FortiAnalyzer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiManager , FortiAnalyzer

item.title: CVE-2022-26118|2024-08-03T04:56:37.796Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortimanager%20%2C%20fortianalyzer
item.description: A privilege chaining vulnerability [CWE-268] in FortiManager and FortiAnalyzer 6.0.x, 6.2.x, 6.4.0 through 6.4.7, 7.0.0 through 7.0.3 may allow a local and authenticated attacker with a restricted shell to escalate their privileges to root due to incorrect permissions of some folders and executable files on the system.
